title: Lilyhammer S2 Ep2 - Out Of Africa
description:
Lilyhammer S2 Ep2 - Out Of Africa

Out of Africa - Frank is attending a celebratory dinner at their new big scam ? the refugee center. He is amazed by the quality of the Italian food, and discovers that the cook, Balotelli, is a Nigerian refugee with exceptional cooking skills. Frank wants him to open a restaurant section at The Flamingo, but Ballotelli has just received a denial on his asylum application and is about to be sent back to Nigeria. Frank and Jan tries to bribe the case officer responsible for Balotellis fate, but he appears to be unbribeable. Instead, Frank kidnaps the case officer and sends him in a crate to Africa to illustrate his point and display his power. Upon the case officers? return, Balotelli is allowed to stay, and the restaurant part of The Flamingo opens. 

From Norway, in Norwegian and English

Subtitles by SBS AU TV
